data_description.utility: The name of your utility provider

login_service.title: Opower Login Service
login_service.description: This utility requires the [Opower Login Service/Add-on](https://github.com/tronikos/opower-login-service). Enter the URL to your already running service. If you do not have the Opower Login Service running, you should install it first.

data.login_service_url: URL of the Opower Login Service

data_description.login_service_url: For example: `http://7ef69028-opower-login-service` if you are running the [add-on](https://github.com/tronikos/opower-login-service), or `http://host-or-ip:7937` if you are running the service manually

data_description.username: The username for your utility account
data_description.password: The password for your utility account
data_description.totp_secret: This is not a 6-digit code. It is a string of around 16 characters containing the shared secret that enables your authenticator app to generate the correct time-based code at the appropriate time. See the documentation.

mfa_options.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
mfa_options.description: Your account requires multi-factor authentication (MFA). Select a method to receive your security code.

data_description.mfa_method: How to receive your security code

mfa_code.title: Enter Security Code
mfa_code.description: A security code has been sent via your selected method. Please enter it below to complete login.

error.cannot_connect_login_service: Failed to connect to the Opower Login Service. Please ensure the URL is correct and the service is running.
error.invalid_mfa_code: The security code is incorrect. Please try again.

abort.no_login_service_required: Your utility does not require the [Opower Login Service/Add-on](https://github.com/tronikos/opower-login-service), so there are no options to configure.

login_service_url_missing.title: Missing Opower Login Service configuration for {utility_name}
login_service_url_missing.description:
Your utility requires the [Opower Login Service/Add-on](https://github.com/tronikos/opower-login-service).

Please go to the [configure options](/config/integrations/integration/opower) to configure it.

return_to_grid_migration.title: Return to grid statistics for account: {utility_account_id}
return_to_grid_migration.description:
We found negative values in your existing consumption statistics, likely because you have solar. We split those in separate return statistics for a better experience in the Energy dashboard.

Please visit the [Energy configuration page]({energy_settings}) to add the following statistics in the **Return to grid** section:

{target_ids}

Once you have added them, ignore this issue.
